items.description: Judogi is the formal Japanese name for the traditional uniform used for Judo practice and competition.
items.name: Judogi

items.description: The berimbau is a single-string percussion instrument, a musical bow, from Brazil. The berimbau was eventually incorporated into the practice of the Afro-Brazilian martial art capoeira, the berimbau (the soul of capoeira) leads the capoeiristas movement in the roda the faster the berimbau is playing the faster the capoeirista moves in the game.
items.name: Berimbau

items.description: The atabaque is a tall, wooden, Afro-Brazilian hand drum. The shell is made traditionally of Jacaranda wood from Brazil. The head is traditionally made from calfskin. A system of ropes are intertwined around the body, connecting a metal ring near the base to the head.
items.name: Atabaque
